name: Penguin Hero
description:
Basic WASD controls

Left Mouse Button - Throw Snowball at ships

Icebergs disappear after some time

If you stay in the water, your toxicity level increases. If it reaches the max toxicity, you will respawn.

Objectives

Destroy all fishermen ships using your snowballs

Collect snowballs

Collect all trash

Acknowledgements:

Boat Prefab: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/sea/polygrunt-low-poly-boat-17...

Trash Prefab: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/trash-low-poly-cartoon-pack-66229

Penguin Prefab, skybox, snow material: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/tutorials/dyp-the-penguin-174519
